Connecting to your printerÂ¶

This module allows you to connect to your receipt printers over USB, network, serial or device file connections. connections. All connections types create a printer object, over which you may send standard escpos command supported by your model. Note that for FilePrinter connections read functions are not available

  • USB Printers
    • Getting vendor id and product id
    • Getting interface id
    • Getting input endpoint
    • Getting output endpoint
    • Creating the printer object
  • Serial Printers
    • Creating the printer object
  • Network Printers
  • Use Printer device file directly on UNIX like OSes
